jpo
Class PictureAdder

java.lang.Object
  jpo.PictureAdder
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener
public class PictureAdder
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.beans.PropertyChangeListener

Brings up a Filechooser and then loads the selected pictures into the collection. It has an asseccory panel that shows a thumbnail of the image.

Field Summary
private  javax.swing.JCheckBox newOnlyJCheckBox
          Checkbox that allows the user to specify that pictures already in the collection should be ignored.
private static int PREFERRED_HEIGHT
          preferred height of accessory panel
private static int PREFERRED_WIDTH
          preferred width of accessory panel
private  javax.swing.JCheckBox recurseJCheckBox
          Checkbox that allows the user to specifiy whether pictures in the subdirectories should be added or not.
private static boolean showThumbnail
          static global variable that remembers whether the user wanted to see thumbnails or not.
private  javax.swing.JCheckBox showThumbnailJCheckBox
          Checkbox that allows the user to specify that pictures already in the collection should be ignored.
private  javax.swing.JLabel thumbnailJLabel
          This component shows the thumbnail.

          Constructor for a PictureAdder.

recurseJCheckBox

private javax.swing.JCheckBox recurseJCheckBox
Checkbox that allows the user to specifiy whether pictures in the subdirectories should be added or not.

Checkbox that allows the user to specify that pictures already in the collection should be ignored.

Checkbox that allows the user to specify that pictures already in the collection should be ignored.

showThumbnail

private static boolean showThumbnail
static global variable that remembers whether the user wanted to see thumbnails or not.

thumbnailJLabel

private javax.swing.JLabel thumbnailJLabel
This component shows the thumbnail. It is a JLabel as we can thus use the ImageIcon to display the pciture.

Constructor Detail

PictureAdder

public PictureAdder(SortableDefaultMutableTreeNode startNode)
Constructor for a PictureAdder. It creates a JFilechooser GUI and then fires off a thread to load the pictures in the background.

Parameters:
startNode - The node to which the selected pictures are to be added.
Method Detail

propertyChange

public void propertyChange(java.beans.PropertyChangeEvent changeEvent)
This method is invoked from the FileChooser and creates the thumbnail. See http://java.sun.com/developer/JDCTechTips/index.html for the March 16 issue on Preview panels in the JFileChooser.

Specified by:
propertyChange in interface java.beans.PropertyChangeListener
